input.sentences: often snooping around in boxes | searching for clues to something more fascinating .
they enjoy scratching their backs on whatever will ease the itch .
and they certainly can beat you in an eye staring contest .
output.sentences: My cat, whose name is Cita, looks curiously at my strange pajamas.
Cita is curious about a lot of things, especially what's inside boxes.
M cat Julie likes to lay on her back.
Julie continues to look at me in expectation of play.
Julie stares at me whenever I pay more attention to Cita.
